mapper.update:
update T_DINNER_PARTY
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DINNER_TYPE = #{dinnerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINK_USER = #{linkUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DINNER_PROJECT = #{dinnerProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SEND_MESSAGE = #{isSendMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_DINNER_PARTY set START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DINNER_TYPE = #{dinnerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_USER = #{linkUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DINNER_PROJECT = #{dinnerProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SEND_MESSAGE = #{isSendMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select t.*, created.username createdName, updated.username updatedName, info.SAVE_NAME saveName from T_DINNER_PARTY t left join t_user created on created.user_id = t.created_by left join t_user updated on updated.user_id = t.updated_by left join T_DOCUMENT_INFO_RELATION relation on relation.RELATION_ID = t.id and relation.RELATION_TYPE='DINNER_PARTY' left join T_DOCUMENT_INFO info on info.id = relation.DOCUMENT_ID
and id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
